T02D3774:188a-0: @188a *// cha gsum 'bring po'i cho ga bzhugs so//
T02D3774:188a-2: * // bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3774:188b-0: gtor ma cha gsum gtong ba rnams kyis @188b dang po mandala byed du bcug la /
T02D3774:188b-1: mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te bdag nyid ltar
T02D3774:188b-2: bskyed nas skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rigs
T02D3774:188b-4: de'i 'og tu gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D3774:188b-12: stobs brjod pa ste 'di tsam gyis ni gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa bstan to //
T02D3774:188b-13: spyan drangs pa dang mchod yon sbrengs te bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02D3774:188b-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa dang /
T02D3774:188b-19: slar gtong ba ste 'di tsam gyis ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02D3774:188b-20: de la dri chu la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor ba ni bsang ba'o //
T02D3774:188b-21: gtor ma'i dbus su yi ge ram bsams te bsreg pa ni sbyang ba'o //
T02D3774:188b-22: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha dharm'a te badzra siddhi h'um zhes bya bas kyang sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3774:188b-23: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spel bar bya ste /
T02D3774:188b-24: thal mo gnyis bkan la snyim pa'i tshul du bya ba ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:188b-25: sngags ni na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo
T02D3774:188b-26: bi shva mu khe bhya: sarba tad kham audga te
T02D3774:188b-27: spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham sv'a
T02D3774:188b-28: h'a zhes pa ni spel ba'o //
T02D3774:188b-29: lag pa sor mo bsnol la gung mo gnyis rtse sprad //
T02D3774:188b-30: de nas bcag ste dpral bar bcings nas dgrol te /
T02D3774:188b-31: aom aa mri te h'um phat ces brjod pa ni bdud rtsir bsgyur ba'o //
T02D3774:188b-32: lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcas la ngag tu /
T02D3774:188b-33: aom aa k'a ra mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'adya
T02D3774:188b-34: nu tba na ntv'ad aom a'a:h'um phat ces pa ni
T02D3774:188b-36: g-yas pa khro bo'i khu tshur bcangs la rdzas la
T02D3774:188b-37: mdzub mo bsgrengs pa gtad de se gol brdab cing
T02D3774:188b-38: bkrol la / na ma: sarba ta tha ga ta
T02D3774:188b-39: aa wa lo ki te aom sambha ra sambha ra
T02D3774:188b-40: h'um zhes pas thob par bya'o //
T02D3774:188b-41: lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcas
T02D3774:188b-42: te aom ru ru sphu ru dzv'a la ti shtha
T02D3774:188b-43: siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a
T02D3774:188b-44: h'a zhes pa spyan gyi sngags kyis mnyam por thob
T02D3774:188b-46: bdag gis bsod nams stobs dang ni //
T02D3774:188b-47: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang //
T02D3774:189a-2: 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams mchod pa dang //
T02D3774:189a-3: sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D3774:189a-4: don rnams gang dag bsam pa kun //
T02D3774:189a-6: de dag thams cad ci rigs pa //
T02D3774:189a-7: thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig / ces brjod do //
T02D3774:189a-8: mgon po kun gshegs gdan la bzhengs //
T02D3774:189a-9: da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus //
T02D3774:189a-10: gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas ngan yang //
T02D3774:189a-11: sh'akya'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang //
T02D3774:189a-12: bdag cag rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D3774:189a-13: gnas 'di nyid du gshegs su gsol//
T02D3774:189a-14: phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan //
T02D3774:189a-15: thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyil po che //
T02D3774:189a-16: lha dang drang srong yi dags srin po klu //
T02D3774:189a-17: rig 'dzin rgyal po dang ni gdon gyi bdag / de dag so so'i dbang po'i skur ston cing //
T02D3774:189a-18: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal ;
T02D3774:189a-19: / bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren gyis //
T02D3774:189a-20: 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D3774:189a-21: aom ae hye hi da sha di ka lo ka
T02D3774:189a-22: p'a la sa pa ri w'a ra sa ma ye
T02D3774:189a-23: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02D3774:189a-24: dril bu dkrol zhing spos bsgrengs re rang rang gi sngags dang /
T02D3774:189a-26: ae hye hi zhes pas spyan drang ngo //
T02D3774:189a-27: mchod yon gyis spyan drangs nas me tog gi gdan phul la /
T02D3774:189a-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa ni lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan te /
T02D3774:189a-29: g-yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur logs su
T02D3774:189a-30: bzhag ste g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yab pa
T02D3774:189a-31: ni brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189a-32: de nyid las mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189a-33: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189a-34: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste
T02D3774:189a-35: gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bkug la mthe bong lag
T02D3774:189a-36: mthil du gzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i
T02D3774:189a-37: phyag rgya'o // spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe
T02D3774:189a-38: bong gi ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni me
T02D3774:189a-39: lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189a-40: de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bong gi ngos la
T02D3774:189a-41: btsugs pa phyir drag tu brkyang pa ni slar gtang
T02D3774:189b-1: snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste sor mo phan tshun
T02D3774:189b-2: bsnol la khu tshur bcangs nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs
T02D3774:189b-3: te gshibs la g-yabs te nang du gzhag pa ni
T02D3774:189b-4: gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-5: de bzhin du bsgrengs te snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o ;
T02D3774:189b-6: / de nyid las srin lag gnyis drag tu brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-7: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcas la mdzub mo
T02D3774:189b-8: dang gung mo gnyis ral gri 'dra bar gshibs la
T02D3774:189b-9: bsgrengs te gzhag / lag pa g-yon pa'ang de bzhin
T02D3774:189b-10: du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag la g-yon
T02D3774:189b-11: pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g-yab pa ni bden bral
T02D3774:189b-13: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yon sta zur
T02D3774:189b-14: logs su ral gri 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden
T02D3774:189b-15: bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-16: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-17: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas mtho bong
T02D3774:189b-18: mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te zhags mig ltar byas
T02D3774:189b-19: la / g-yas pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas
T02D3774:189b-20: te snying gar bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags
T02D3774:189b-21: kyus g-yab pa ni chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag
T02D3774:189b-22: la / rgya'o // phyag rgya de nyid las g-yon
T02D3774:189b-23: pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur du gzhag pa las zhags
T02D3774:189b-24: mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi
T02D3774:189b-25: la / rgya'o // phyag rgya'o // g-yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar gtang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-26: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gung mo
T02D3774:189b-27: bsgrengs pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor
T02D3774:189b-28: nyo btsugs la sta zur la gzhag / g-yas pa'ang
T02D3774:189b-29: de bzhin sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe bong
T02D3774:189b-30: bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o
T02D3774:189b-31: // de nyid las mthe bong snga ma ltar byas pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-32: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-33: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la
T02D3774:189b-34: rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste mthe chung
T02D3774:189b-36: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas
T02D3774:189b-37: gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste g-yab pa
T02D3774:189b-38: ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:189b-39: de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje
T02D3774:189b-40: bcing ba'i tshul ltar bya ste snying gar gzhag pa
T02D3774:190a-0: ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi @190a * //

T02D3774:190a-3: lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te thal mo gcig
T02D3774:190a-4: tu sbyar ba'i srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du
T02D3774:190a-6: gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs pa'i rgyab logs su
T02D3774:190a-7: mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra
T02D3774:190a-8: bar bya / mthe bong gnyis bar du gshibs te
T02D3774:190a-9: bzhag la de nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse
T02D3774:190a-10: sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan spyan
T02D3774:190a-12: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i
T02D3774:190a-13: tshul du snying gar gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi
T02D3774:190a-15: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:190a-16: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag
T02D3774:190a-17: la steng du kha bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyis
T02D3774:190a-18: lcags kyus g-yab pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa

T02D3774:190a-20: snga ma ltar byas te snying gar gzhag pa ni
T02D3774:190a-22: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:190a-23: phyag rgya de rnams nyid las kha 'og tu bltas
T02D3774:190a-24: na 'og gi lha spyan drang ba la sogs par
T02D3774:190a-25: 'gyur ro // lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te
T02D3774:190a-26: sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par phan tshun rtse
T02D3774:190a-27: 'gyur ro // sprad la / mthe bong dang mdzub
T02D3774:190a-28: mo gnyis zlum por byas pa'i lcags kyus g-yab ba
T02D3774:190a-29: pa ni sa'i lha mo la sogs pa spyan drad
T02D3774:190a-30: 'gyur ro // sprad la / ba'i phyag rgya'o /
T02D3774:190a-31: mdzub mo mi g-yab par snga ma ltar snying gar
T02D3774:190a-32: gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o /
T02D3774:190a-33: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3774:190a-35: aom ru dh'a ya gri hne dam aargham sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-36: de bzhin du pu shapam sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-42: sa ha shra aa ksha ye gri hne dam aargham sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-44: aom ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-45: aom ni r++ri ty'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-46: aom ba ru n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-47: aom b'a ya be sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-48: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-49: aom y'i sha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-50: aom au rddham bra hma n'a ya sv'a h; a /
T02D3774:190a-51: aom s'u rya gra ha ya aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190a-52: aom tsandra na ksha tra aa dhi pa ta ye /
T02D3774:190a-53: aa dh'a pri th'i bhya: aa su re bhya: n'a
T02D3774:190a-54: ge bhya: gri hne dam aargham sv'a h'a zhes bya
T02D3774:190a-55: ba la sogs pas mchod la bstod pa bya ste
T02D3774:190a-56: / dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lta //
T02D3774:190a-57: lha yi rgyal po dgon gyi bdag /
T02D3774:190b-0: @190b shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-1: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-2: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
T02D3774:190b-3: drang srong rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar lho gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-4: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-5: gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D3774:190b-6: ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-7: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-8: bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
T02D3774:190b-9: srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / bden bral gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-10: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-11: zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha//
T02D3774:190b-12: klu yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-13: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-14: rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02D3774:190b-15: rig 'dzin rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / nub byang gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-16: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-17: gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs //
T02D3774:190b-18: nor skyong dgon gyi bdag po ste //
T02D3774:190b-19: byang phyogs dgon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-20: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-21: dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
T02D3774:190b-22: 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-23: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-24: steng gi tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D3774:190b-25: nyi ma zla ba gza' chen po //
T02D3774:190b-26: gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la //
T02D3774:190b-27: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-28: 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha //
T02D3774:190b-29: sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste //
T02D3774:190b-30: dam tshig shes pa'i tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:190b-31: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3774:190b-32: zhes bstod de gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D3774:190b-33: aom pa shu pa te n'i la kantha au ma
T02D3774:190b-34: pri y'a ya na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te
T02D3774:190b-35: bhyo bi shva mu khe bhya: sarba tha kham audga
T02D3774:190b-36: te spha ra na ai mamg ga na khi gri
T02D3774:190b-37: hne dam ba lim ta sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190b-38: aom sa ha shra aa ksha ae aom aa gne ma h'a te dzas ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190b-39: aom karma nu sha ma dharma r'a dz'a ya /
T02D3774:190b-40: aom r'a ksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye rakta
T02D3774:190b-41: m'a la rakta pri y'a ya aom ma h'a n'a
T02D3774:190b-42: g'a pri ya padma pri ya /
T02D3774:190b-44: aom ga ga na bi sa ri sarba sa tvo aanta k'a ya /
T02D3774:190b-45: aom du rgra ha pri ya sarba de ba ta l'a ya /
T02D3774:190b-46: aom aurdham bra hma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:190b-47: aom s'urya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:191a-0: aom tsandra na ksha tra aa dhi @191a * //
T02D3774:191a-2: aom aa dhv'a pri thv'i bhya: aa su re bhya:
T02D3774:191a-3: n'a ge bhya:sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gtor
T02D3774:191a-5: shar phyogs rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas //
T02D3774:191a-6: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D3774:191a-7: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02D3774:191a-8: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
T02D3774:191a-9: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D3774:191a-10: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02D3774:191a-11: ri yi lha dang gtsang ma'i tshogs bcas la //
T02D3774:191a-12: de dag so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di //
T02D3774:191a-13: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas su //
T02D3774:191a-14: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D3774:191a-15: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
T02D3774:191a-16: nang mi dmag dpung bcas dang lhan cig tu //
T02D3774:191a-17: gtor ma me tog dri dang bdug par bcas //
T02D3774:191a-18: 'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang //
T02D3774:191a-19: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D3774:191a-21: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste ci yang ma yin pa'i bden pa dang /
T02D3774:191a-22: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D3774:191a-23: thugs rje rnam par dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang
T02D3774:191a-27: bdag gi mos pa'i mthu dang /
T02D3774:191a-29: smon lam gyi dbang gis mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma
T02D3774:191a-30: 'di lha'i zhal zas dri dang ro dang kha dog
T02D3774:191a-31: dang bcud phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3774:191a-32: gnas dang gos dang bkol ba dang bzhon pa dang
T02D3774:191a-33: rgyan la sogs pa ste 'dod pa'i yon tan ldas
T02D3774:191a-34: brgyan pa dbang po drug gi spyod yul dang 'tsham
T02D3774:191a-35: zhing tshim par byed pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T02D3774:191a-37: dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs te 'phags pa kun
T02D3774:191a-38: du bzang po'i rnam par thar pa las byung ba'i
T02D3774:191a-39: mchod pa'i sprin gyi phung po chen po lta bur
T02D3774:191a-40: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig 'byung zhing 'khor ba'i
T02D3774:191a-41: mthas gtugs pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig /
T02D3774:191a-42: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
T02D3774:191a-43: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D3774:191a-44: de la 'gog pa gang yin pa //
T02D3774:191a-45: dge sbyong chen pos 'di skad gsungs //
T02D3774:191a-46: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste //
T02D3774:191a-47: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
T02D3774:191a-48: rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul //
T02D3774:191b-0: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan @191b pa yin //
T02D3774:191b-1: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
T02D3774:191b-2: ngag gi sdom pa legs pa yin //
T02D3774:191b-3: yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste //
T02D3774:191b-4: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
T02D3774:191b-5: thams cad srung ba'i dge slong dag / sdug bsngal kun las nges grol lo //
T02D3774:191b-6: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu sta //
T02D3774:191b-7: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D3774:191b-8: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D3774:191b-9: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D3774:191b-10: ngo bo med cing gnas pa med //
T02D3774:191b-11: de ltar chos rnams shes kyis la //
T02D3774:191b-12: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D3774:191b-13: 'on kyang skyob pa'i sras su skye //
T02D3774:191b-14: da ltar gyur pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya
T02D3774:191b-15: chen po 'di che ge mo'i don du bsngo zhing
T02D3774:191b-16: 'bul ba'i gnas ni phyogs skyong ba'i srung ma dam
T02D3774:191b-17: tshig can khyed rnams byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D3774:191b-19: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mtha' dag la gnas shing
T02D3774:191b-20: bstan pa dang 'khor rnam bzhi bsrung bar zhal gyis
T02D3774:191b-21: bzhes pa'i dam tshig can khyed rnams la mchod pa
T02D3774:191b-25: de dag gi spyan lam mnga' ris su yang so so'i ci la dgyes pa dang /
T02D3774:191b-26: gang dag gang gis 'dul ba de lta bu'i chos
T02D3774:191b-27: dang zang zing gi longs spyod 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D3774:191b-28: rten las 'das pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa
T02D3774:191b-29: dang ldan pa sgrub pa po so so'i rnam par
T02D3774:191b-31: thar pa'i sgor tshud pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D3774:191b-32: zhig 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid du 'byung zhing rgyas
T02D3774:191b-33: par gyur cig / srung ma dam tshig can khyed
T02D3774:191b-34: rnams kyis che ge mo'i don du thugs brtse bar
T02D3774:191b-35: dgongs te gsol zhing bzhes su gsol /
T02D3774:191b-36: bdag gi bar mdzad du gsol /
T02D3774:191b-37: che ge mo'i sngon gyi las las gyur kyang rung /
T02D3774:191b-38: 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur kyang rung ste /
T02D3774:191b-39: da ltar gyi lus la gnod pa'i sbyor ba bgyid
T02D3774:191b-40: pa gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad sems
T02D3774:191b-41: zhi ba chen por bsgyur zhing gnod pa mi bgyid
T02D3774:191b-43: gal te zhi bas bsgyur du mi btub na yang
T02D3774:191b-44: khyad par can khyed kyi mnga' ris su ma 'dus
T02D3774:191b-45: pa gang yang ma mchis pas so so'i rigs kyis
T02D3774:191b-47: bskrad cing mtshams bcad pa dang /
T02D3774:191b-50: spa bkong bar mdzad du gsol /
T02D3774:192a-0: che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di yon tan phun sum tshogs par @192a * //
T02D3774:192a-2: bdag cag gis bsngags pa'i las yid bzhin du 'grub
T02D3774:192a-3: par mdzad du gsol zhes bya bas las bcol lo
T02D3774:192a-4: // gong du smos pa'i rang rang gi sngags dang
T02D3774:192a-5: slar gtang ba'i phyag rgyas gatstsha zhes brjod de slar
T02D3774:192a-6: // gtang ngo // 'byung po spyi'i gtor ma yang bsang ba la sogs pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D3774:192a-7: dang po spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D3774:192a-8: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D3774:192a-9: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02D3774:192a-10: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D3774:192a-11: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D3774:192a-12: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa la ;
T02D3774:192a-13: / bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D3774:192a-14: thal sbyar khyed rnams la ni gsol 'debs kyis //
T02D3774:192a-15: gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir spyon cig /
T02D3774:192a-16: ces bya bas gong ma bzhin du spyan drang ngo
T02D3774:192a-17: // aom ae hye hi lo ka ka r'a ya /
T02D3774:192a-20: ga ru da ki nna ra /
T02D3774:192a-21: ma ho ra ga ma nu shya aa ma nu
T02D3774:192a-22: shya sa pa ri w'a ra sa ma ye sv'a
T02D3774:192a-23: h'a zhes bya bas spyan drang ngo //
T02D3774:192a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni gzhung na med do //
T02D3774:192a-25: mchod pa ni rang rang sngags dang gong ma bzhin du dbul lo //
T02D3774:192a-27: aom de ba gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-28: aom n'a ga gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-31: aom aa su ra gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-32: aom ga ru da gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-33: aom kinna ra gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-34: aom ma ho ra ga gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-35: aom ma nu shya gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:192a-36: aom aa ma nu shya gandhe bhya:sv'a h'a zhes bya
T02D3774:192a-37: ba dang mchod yon nas gtor ma'i bar gyis mchod
T02D3774:192a-40: 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D3774:192a-41: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02D3774:192a-42: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D3774:192a-43: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D3774:192a-44: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas gang dang //
T02D3774:192a-45: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
T02D3774:192a-46: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang ;
T02D3774:192a-47: / g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02D3774:192a-48: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02D3774:192a-49: khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D3774:192a-50: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang //
T02D3774:192a-51: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02D3774:192a-52: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02D3774:192b-0: lam @192b srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02D3774:192b-1: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
T02D3774:192b-2: dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang //
T02D3774:192b-3: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas rnams dang //
T02D3774:192b-4: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02D3774:192b-5: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02D3774:192b-6: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02D3774:192b-7: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D3774:192b-8: phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang //
T02D3774:192b-9: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
T02D3774:192b-10: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02D3774:192b-11: las 'di dag gi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D3774:192b-13: de'i rjes la las bcol ba ni /
T02D3774:192b-14: de ltar gyur pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya
T02D3774:192b-15: chen po 'di brgya byin gtan pa med pa'i mchod
T02D3774:192b-16: par dmigs te lha klu khyed rnams la 'bul lo
T02D3774:192b-21: de dag thams cad kyi gnas ris so so gang la mos pa dang ci dga' ba dang /
T02D3774:192b-22: gang gis 'dul zhing 'tsham pa'i mchod sbyin chos dang
T02D3774:192b-23: zang zing gi longs spyod 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D3774:192b-24: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa so
T02D3774:192b-25: so'i rnam par thar pa dang mthun pa /
T02D3774:192b-26: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa phyi ma'i mtha'i
T02D3774:192b-27: mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang spyod pa grangs med
T02D3774:192b-29: tshad med par bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar
T02D3774:192b-30: gyur cig / chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung
T02D3774:192b-32: sras su skye zhes pa'i bar du gong bzhin du brjod /
T02D3774:192b-33: chos kyi sbyin pas sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis ni byang /
T02D3774:192b-34: tshogs rnam pa gnyis ni rdzogs nas mya ngan las
T02D3774:192b-35: 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa la myur du gnas
T02D3774:192b-36: par gyur cig / de ltar tshad med pa'i chos
T02D3774:192b-37: dang zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis che ge mo
T02D3774:192b-38: zhes bya ba'i sngon gyi las las gyur kyang rung
T02D3774:192b-39: / 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur kyang rung ste ltar gyi lus kyi na tsha dang /
T02D3774:192b-40: sems kyi sgrib pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang
T02D3774:192b-41: rmi lam ngan pa la sogs pa thams cad zhi
T02D3774:192b-42: bar gyur cig / tshe ring ba dang /
T02D3774:192b-46: gzi mdangs dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3774:192b-47: dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D3774:192b-48: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig ces brjod de /
T02D3774:193a-1: bcol nas gong du smos pa'i rang rang gi sngags
T02D3774:193a-2: dang gatstsha: zhes brjod la mchod yon sbrengs la slar
T02D3774:193a-3: gtang ngo // bgegs gtor ni bsang ba nas stobs
T02D3774:193a-4: brjod pa'i bar du gong ma bzhin du bya ste
T02D3774:193a-5: gtang ngo // / de'i 'og tu bdag nyid khro
T02D3774:193a-6: bor gsal bar dmigs la khro bo gang yin pa
T02D3774:193a-7: de'i sngags brgya'am stong bzlas te bskul la /
T02D3774:193a-8: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
T02D3774:193a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02D3774:193a-16: bgegs kyi rigs gang yin pa de thams cad skad
T02D3774:193a-17: cig thang cig yud tsam la 'dir mchis par gyur
T02D3774:193a-18: cig ces brjod la lcags kyu'am /
T02D3774:193a-19: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug par bya'o //
T02D3774:193a-20: mchod yon sbrengs la mdun du bzhag la /
T02D3774:193a-21: aom gum ka ri gum ka ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:193a-22: pi tsi pi tsi sv'a h'a /
T02D3774:193a-23: aom gum gum sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02D3774:193a-24: phyogs skyong mchod pa'i sngags gri hne dam zhes bya bas mchod pa bya'o //
T02D3774:193a-25: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3774:193a-26: h'um gang dag mtshan mo rgyu ba yi //
T02D3774:193a-27: 'byung po rnams dang sha za dang //
T02D3774:193a-28: srin po sha rjen za ba dang //
T02D3774:193a-29: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D3774:193a-30: ljon shing gel pa la sogs pa //
T02D3774:193a-31: de dang de la gtor ma ni //
T02D3774:193a-32: bza' dang sha chang la phug bcas //
T02D3774:193a-34: mchod sbyin 'di yis mgu byos la //
T02D3774:193a-35: gnod pa'i bsam pa zhi ba dang //
T02D3774:193a-36: bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i yid //
T02D3774:193a-37: di ring phan chad bskyed par gyis //
T02D3774:193a-38: zhes bya bas bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3774:193a-39: des na tshig 'dis bden pa bdar ro //
T02D3774:193a-40: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas kyang chos spyod cing //
T02D3774:193a-41: dul zhing yang dag sdom la tshangs par spyod //
T02D3774:193a-42: 'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ste //
T02D3774:193a-43: dge slong dge spyod de yin bram ze'ang de //
T02D3774:193a-44: mtshon chas mi 'jigs gang yang med //
T02D3774:193a-46: rang gi lus la dpe long la //
T02D3774:193a-47: gzhan la gnod pa ma byed cig //
T02D3774:193a-48: aom chen po 'am chung du gang dag gis //
T02D3774:193a-49: lus la mngon par gnod gyur pa'i //
T02D3774:193a-50: nad de rab tu dbyung bar bgyis //
T02D3774:193a-51: gdon rnams rang gi gnas su dengs //
T02D3774:193a-52: de ltar bdag gis ci nus su //
T02D3774:193a-53: mchod dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yis //
T02D3774:193a-54: dam tshig gnas la gnas nas su //
T02D3774:193b-0: bdag gi bsam @193b pa skong bar mdzod //
T02D3774:193b-1: rtag tu dam tshig la gnas shing //
T02D3774:193b-2: 'dis ni che ge mo zhig gis //
T02D3774:193b-3: nad de rab tu bsal mdzod la //
T02D3774:193b-4: gdon rnams rang gi gnas su song //
T02D3774:193b-6: aom sarba bi ghn'an gatstsha zhes bya bas slar gtang ngo //
T02D3774:193b-7: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mtshams bcad pa ni ;
T02D3774:193b-8: na ma:sa manta k'a ya b'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02D3774:193b-9: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D3774:193b-10: ma ny'a damshto ta ka ta bhee ra b'a ya /
T02D3774:193b-11: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
T02D3774:193b-12: aom aa mri ta kunda li kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3774:193b-19: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02D3774:193b-20: sarba bighn'am bi n'a ya k'an ma h'a ga na
T02D3774:193b-21: pa ti dz'i bi ta aanta ka r'a ya sv'a
T02D3774:193b-23: cha gsum 'bring po'i cho ga nor bu gling pa
T02D3774:193b-24: bde ba'i rdo rje'i gdams ngag la brten nas pandi
T02D3774:193b-25: ta shraddha ka ra warmas nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs
T02D3774:193b-27: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang bod
